description: This file defines functions and types related to reading and managing the state of a to-do list application. It includes type definitions for to-do lists and tasks, and an API handler to retrieve or initialize the application state, storing data in local storage.

methods.name: async function readState(event: H3Event): Promise<{lists: TodoList[]; tasksByList: Record<string/ readState
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves or initializes the to-do list application state from storage.

ctags.name: STORAGE_KEY
ctags.pattern: /^const STORAGE_KEY = 'ocean_todo_state'$/

ctags.name: Task
ctags.pattern: /^type Task = {$/

ctags.name: TodoList
ctags.pattern: /^type TodoList = {$/

ctags.name: data
ctags.pattern: /^  const data = await storage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY)$/

ctags.name: dueDate
ctags.pattern: /^        { id: 't1', listId: listA.id, title: 'Welcome to Ocean To‑do', completed: false, dueDa/

ctags.name: dueDate
ctags.pattern: /^        { id: 't2', listId: listA.id, title: 'Create your first list →', completed: false, due/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^        { id: 't2', listId: listA.id, title: 'Create your first list →', completed: false, due/

ctags.name: initial
ctags.pattern: /^  const initial = {$/

ctags.name: listA
ctags.pattern: /^  const listA: TodoList = { id: 'inbox', name: 'Inbox', color: '#93c5fd', createdAt: now, update/

ctags.name: now
ctags.pattern: /^  const now = new Date().toISOString()$/

ctags.name: priority
ctags.pattern: /^        { id: 't1', listId: listA.id, title: 'Welcome to Ocean To‑do', completed: false, dueDa/

ctags.name: priority
ctags.pattern: /^        { id: 't2', listId: listA.id, title: 'Create your first list →', completed: false, due/

ctags.name: readState
ctags.pattern: /^async function readState(event: H3Event): Promise<{lists: TodoList[]; tasksByList: Record<string/

ctags.name: storage
ctags.pattern: /^  const storage = useStorage()$/

ctags.name: tasksByList
ctags.pattern: /^    tasksByList: {$/

ctags.name: title
ctags.pattern: /^        { id: 't1', listId: listA.id, title: 'Welcome to Ocean To‑do', completed: false, dueDa/

ctags.name: title
ctags.pattern: /^        { id: 't2', listId: listA.id, title: 'Create your first list →', completed: false, due/

ctags.name: updatedAt
ctags.pattern: /^        { id: 't1', listId: listA.id, title: 'Welcome to Ocean To‑do', completed: false, dueDa/

ctags.name: updatedAt
ctags.pattern: /^        { id: 't2', listId: listA.id, title: 'Create your first list →', completed: false, due/

ctags.pattern: /^  const listA: TodoList = { id: 'inbox', name: 'Inbox', color: '#93c5fd', createdAt: now, update/
